overview.description: A subscription-based app for learning Indonesian cooking techniques.
overview.problem_statement: Many home cooks struggle to learn authentic Indonesian cooking techniques due to lack of accessible, interactive, and expert-guided resources.
objectives: Provide comprehensive, step-by-step Indonesian cooking tutorials
Create an engaging and interactive learning platform for culinary enthusiasts
Bridge the gap between traditional cooking knowledge and modern learning methods

success_metrics.definition: Average time spent on the app per user per week
Percentage of free trial users converting to paid subscriptions
Percentage of users completing a cooking tutorial

user_stories.title: Browse Cooking Tutorials
user_stories.user_story: As a home cook, I want to browse available cooking tutorials by cuisine type and difficulty level
acceptance_criteria: User can filter tutorials by Indonesian region
Each tutorial shows estimated cooking time

user_stories.title: Interactive Step-by-Step Guide
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to have an interactive, step-by-step cooking guide with video and text instructions
acceptance_criteria: Each step has a video demonstration
Users can mark steps as completed

user_stories.title: Community Forum Integration
user_stories.user_story: As an app user, I want to have access to a community forum where I can connect with other users, ask questions, and share cooking tips
acceptance_criteria: Forum is easily accessible from within the app
Users can post questions and receive responses
App team monitors forum for support and content moderation

future_considerations: Exploring partnerships with Indonesian culinary schools and chefs for content expansion
Investigating the use of AI for personalized recipe recommendations
Developing additional interactive features to enhance the learning experience, such as virtual cooking classes and skill assessments
